title: Changing solr.cloud.wait-for-updates-with-stale-state-pause for tests
description:
solr.cloud.wait-for-updates-with-stale-state-pause is by default 2.5 seconds and it controls how long the follower waits for updates on leader (see SOLR-7141).

SOLR-9849 changes the sysprop in the test but it does not always applies to the tests.
